item.title: Report E-2024010391
item.description:
Report E-2024010391

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-24T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-20
  • City: GREENWOOD
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ADVANTAGE MANAGEMENT GROUP, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC driver was delivering diesel fuel into the customer's storage tank when the connection between the hose adaptor and tank became compromised. This allowed approximately 50 gallons of diesel fuel to be released. E3 Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
